programme.title: Timecop: O Guardio do Tempo, (1994, Action)
programme.desc: Max Walker, um oficial de uma agncia de segurana que regula as viagens no tempo, deve lutar por sua vida contra um poltico sombrio que pretende mudar o passado para controlar o futuro.

programme.title: Beowulf: O Guerreiro das Sombras, (1999, Adventure)
programme.desc: Numa terra sob cerco, Beowulf deve combater a horrvel criatura Grendel e a sua me que procura vingana.

programme.title: Hellraiser: Renascido do Inferno, (1987, Satanic Stories)
programme.desc: Uma esposa infiel encontra o zumbi de seu amante morto; cenobitas demonacos o perseguem depois que ele escapou de seu submundo sadomasoquista.

programme.title: Austin Powers - Um Agente Nada Discreto, (1998, Comedy)
programme.desc: O agente secreto Austin Powers esteve congelado por dcadas e agora trazido de volta ativa quando uma nova ameaa mundial surge e suas habilidades so novamente requisitadas. Porm, Austin ter que se adaptar nova sociedade e isso ser hilrio.

programme.title: Duna, (1985, Adventure)
programme.desc: Do aclamado diretor David Lynch. Em 10.190 D.C., um duque e sua famlia so mandados pelo Imperador para Arrakis, um rido planeta conhecido como Duna, que tem uma matria essencial s viagens interplanetrias: a Especiaria.

programme.title: Crimes de Rua, (2004, Action)
programme.desc: Dois policiais, um com uma arma e outro com os punhos, arriscam tudo para tornar o bairro livre de crimes e drogas, derrubando o mais poderoso chefo das ruas

programme.title: Mscara Negra, (1996, Action)
programme.desc: O sobrevivente de um projeto para criar super soldados deve lutar contra seus ex-companheiros como um heri mascarado.

programme.title: Conspirao Fatal, (2001, Action)
programme.desc: Depois de ser preso e ter sua reputao na Fora Area manchada, um piloto veterano foge da cadeia e parte em busca do verdadeiro criminoso. Ele, ento, descobre uma conspirao terrorista em andamento e somente ele poder evitar um desastre.

programme.title: Em Busca de um Milagre, (2018, Drama)
programme.desc: O mundo do doutor Luke Matthew desaba quando ele perde o amor de sua vida e se torna pai na mesma noite. Quando ele contrata Sage como a nova bab, os dois comeam a perceber que a melhor forma de remdio deixar ir.

programme.title: Davi e Golias, (2020, Adventure)
programme.desc: No cruzamento de dois grandes imprios, um simples pastor chamado David se transforma em um poderoso guerreiro e enfrenta um gigante aterrorizante. Uma das batalhas mais lendrias da histria recontada em um conto de coragem e f.

programme.title: Atormentado pelo passado, (2020, Faith & Spirituality)
programme.desc: Um homem luta para chegar a um acordo com a insegurana paralisante e os resduos de seu abuso sexual na infncia nas mos de um padre confivel e respeitado.

programme.title: O Chamado de Deus, (2015, Inspirational Drama)
programme.desc: Uma jovem problemtica que trabalha em um call center de oraes faz a diferena na vida de outras pessoas, o que a faz lidar com seu passado conturbado quando finalmente um dia percebe a f.

programme.title: A rvore Da Vida, (2011, Drama)
programme.desc: A histria de uma famlia em Waco, Texas, em 1956. O filho mais velho testemunha a perda da inocncia e luta com os ensinamentos conflitantes de seus pais.

programme.title: O Melhor Ladro do Mundo, (2005, Drama)
programme.desc: Depois que o marido tem um derrame, Sue Zaidman passa a ser a nica provedora de sua famlia. Ela enfrenta uma fase difcil e turbulenta, e tem que se impor para lidar com os filhos e manter-se firme apesar das adversidades.

programme.title: Prisioneiras Nunca Mais, (2021, Thriller)
programme.desc: Inspirada em acontecimentos reais, Prisioneiras Nunca Mais conta a histria de Aggie, em busca de suas duas afilhadas, sequestradas pelo pai para serem vendidas como escravas. O filme um drama sobre a realidade do trfico humano.

programme.title: Betty e Coretta, (2013, Drama)
programme.desc: Estrelando Mary J. Blige e Angela Bassett. Coretta Scott King e a Dra. Betty Shabazz, esposas do Dr. Martin Luther King e de Malcolm X, devem continuar suas vidas como mes solteiras aps o assassinato de seus maridos.

programme.title: Shigeru fez uma promessa: ficar amigo do Monstro Kaima Kurukuruten. No entanto, Kurukuruten deu a ele uma terrvel ordem: eliminar a humanidade. RX chega para lidar com essa situao, derrotando o ardiloso Kurukuruten.

programme.title: Os Reis da Rua, (2008, Action)
programme.desc: Um policial veterano vai contra cultura policial da qual fez parte a sua carreira inteira.

programme.title: O Sequestro do nibus 657, (2015, Action)
programme.desc: Um pai no tem meios para pagar o tratamento mdico da filha. Como ltimo recurso, ele se une a um colega de trabalho ganancioso para roubar um cassino. Quando as coisas do errado, eles so forados a sequestrar um nibus da cidade.

programme.title: Em Busca da Fama, (2020, Crime)
programme.desc: Arielle (Bella Thorne) uma jovem de uma cidade pequena da Florida que trabalha em um restaurante, mas sempre quis mais para a sua vida: fama, popularidade, e admirao.

programme.title: Antes Que o Diabo Saiba Que Voc Est Morto, (2008, Drama)
programme.desc: Andy e seu irmo Hank esto com problemas financeiros. Eles organizam um assalto a uma pequena joalheria para para sarem dessa situao de forma rpida e sem causar vtimas. O crime comea a dar errado quando descobrem que a loja pertence aos seus pais.

programme.title: At Que a Morte nos Separe, (2017, Thriller)
programme.desc: Madison acreditava ter encontrado aquele, at que Michael se tornou controlador e violento. Ela escapa e com sua nova identidade encontra Alex, mas Michael a encontra novamente, recriando seus pesadelos.

programme.title: Co de briga, (2005, Action)
programme.desc: Criado por um mafioso (Hoskins) como um animal para ser uma mquina de matar, (Jet Li) campeo de lutas clandestinas que ajuda pianista cego (Freeman) perseguido por criminosos.

programme.title: Dupla em Fria, (2013, Action Comedies)
programme.desc: Uma onda de assassinatos sacode Hong Kong. O jovem detetive Wang Bu Er tem certeza de que eles so o trabalho de um assassino em sriee, junto com Huang Fei Hong, um mestre do kung, eles empreendem uma aventura em ritmo acelerado para investigar o caso.

programme.title: Instinto Selvagem 2, (2006, Crime)
programme.desc: A romancista Catherine est novamente em apuros com a lei e a Scotland Yard nomeia o psiquiatra Dr. Michael Glass para avali-la. No entanto, como o detetive Nick Curran antes dele, Glass fica fascinado por Tramell e atrado para um jogo sedutor.

programme.title: Pecados da Mfia, (2017, Drama)
programme.desc: Nas ruas de Npoles, dominadas pelo crime, um padre recm-chegado enfrenta a mfia local e desafia o seu domnio sobre a comunidade.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Luta Entre Marionetes: Dez Contra Cem!
programme.desc: Sakura e vov chiyo esto enfrentando uma batalha feroz contra sasori, onde ele pode se tornar um boneco humano. Elas derrotam sasori dentro do prazo, mas ele acaba revivendo.
programme.sub-title: Luta Entre Marionetes: Dez Contra Cem!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Sonho Impossvel
programme.desc: Embora tenha sido envenenada, vov chiyo usa o ltimoantdoto em sakura. Zombando da terna cena entre vov chiyo e sakura, sasori tenta por fim vida de vov chiyo. Mas vov chiyo revida e derrota sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Feras Ressuscitadas!
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta desesperada de sakura e vov chiyo, enquanto enfrentam suas cpias.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Kakashi Iluminado
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar naruto com a vov chiyo, que est sofrendo com o veneno. Os membros da equipe guy correm paraajudar a equipe kakashi. Enquanto isso, com as preparaes completas, kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Esttica De Um Momento
programme.desc: Na Aldeia da Folha, a equipe de Konohamaru foi promovida a Genin e agora est sob a superviso de Ebisu. Um Naruto mais velho chega aldeia aps uma longa jornada de treinamento com Jiraiya. Naruto Uzumaki est de volta!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Legado
programme.desc: Jiraiya traz notcias altamente secretas de que os Akatsuki entraram em ao. Naruto e Sakura propem a Kakashi um desafio de sobrevivncia. Na Aldeia da Areia, Gaara o Kazekage agora, e membros da Akatsuki se infiltram na aldeia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Volta Do Kazekage
programme.desc: As habilidades de Naruto e Sakura foram Kakashi a usar seu sharingan imediatamente. Naruto lana um jutsu aps outro. Sakura usa tcnicas ensinadas a ela por Tsunade. Deidara da Akatsuki comea uma operao secreta para se infiltrar na Aldeia da Areia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Alvo
programme.desc: Gaara percebe a presena de Deidara e comea uma batalha area na areia. O jonin da areia Yura, um agente da Akatsuki, e a Aldeia da Areia sofre danos. Na Aldeia da Folha, Naruto e Sakura veem o incrvel poder de Kakashi. A dupla d seu golpe final.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Formao! A Nova Equipe Kakashi
programme.desc: Naruto e Sakura derrotam Kakashi. Tsunade os nomeia como uma equipe de trs liderados por Kakashi, dizendo que agora so todos iguais. Gaara e Deidara continuam sua batalha. Baki fica preocupado que o shukaku se materialize, mas Kankuro ri da ideia.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Uma Adio Indesejada
programme.desc: Para proteger sua aldeia da argila explosiva de Deidara, Gaara usa seu chakra para criar um escudo. A aldeia salva a um enorme custo. Gaara fica vulnervel. As tentativas de seus companheiros so inteis, e Gaara acaba caindo nas mos de Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Falso Sorriso
programme.desc: Gaara arrastado para longe por Deidara. Kankuro sai com um peloto para salvar Gaara, mas os Akatsuki haviam instalado armadilhas engenhosas. Determinado, Kankuro encontra sozinho os Akatsuki. A nova equipe de Naruto comemora sua primeira misso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Sem Ttulo
programme.desc: Temari encontra Kakashi e sua equipe. Naruto explode de raiva pelos Akatsuki. Como tambm hospeda uma besta de cauda dentro de si, Naruto entende o que Gaara est sofrendo. Kankuro infectado por um veneno. Sem um antdoto, ele ter poucos dias de vida.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Simulao
programme.desc: Chega uma mensagem da Aldeia da Areia sobre o sequestro do Kazekage. Tsunade manda a equipe Kakashi para a aldeia. Kankuro comea a batalha contra os Akatsuki, mas as tticas dos bonecos no funcionam. Seu oponente foi quem desenvolveu essas tticas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Ponte Tenchi
programme.desc: Os ninjas tentam salvar Kankuro. Vov Chiyo, perita em veneno, chamada. Uma tempestade de areia atrasa Naruto, Sakura e Kakashi. Tsunade se preocupa e envia Guy e sua equipe. O akatsuki e Gaara comeam o jutsu de selamento e os nove drages fantasmas.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Nove Caudas Se Liberta
programme.desc: Sakura trata Kankuro, deixando todos espantados com suas mos firmes. Vov Chiyo fica emocionada por Tsunade ter enviado sua prpria aprendiz e pela determinao de Sakura. Kankuro fornece informaes sobre os Akatsuki. Kakashi envia um co de caa ninja.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia
programme.desc: Pakkun acha o esconderijo dos Akatsuki. Temari recebe ordens para ajudar a proteger a aldeia. Vov Chiyo se oferece para ficar no lugar de Temari. Naruto e Sakura ficam chocados com a histria das bestas de cauda.
programme.sub-title: A Misso Super Secreta Se Inicia

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Orochimaru Versus Jinchuriki
programme.desc: A equipe Kakashi encontra Itachi Uchiha, de quem sofrera uma amarga derrota no passado. Guy e sua equipe comeam a lutar contra um amargo rival, Kisame, que lana um poderoso chakra para subjugar o ninja da folha. Seu jutsu aprisiona Neji, Lee e Tenten.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Lgrimas De Sakura
programme.desc: Guy se arrepende ao ver seus trs alunos presos. Determinado a parar Kisame, Guy o desafia usando o nunchaku. Sem oxignio, Tenten vai ficando fraca, e Guy se prepara para usar um jutsu secreto e proibido. Naruto cai no genjutsu de Itachi.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Segredo Da Batalha
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo e Sakura salvam Naruto do genjutsu de Itachi. Kakashi comea um contra-ataque e exibe toda sua destreza. Guy enfrenta dificuldades contra Kisame, mas o derrota com um poderoso jutsu. Os ninjas da folha conseguem derrotar seu arquiminigo.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: As Consequncias Da Traio
programme.desc: Kisame e Itachi parecem ter sido clones cujos poderes foram copiados por um jutsu de personificao. Vov Chiyo explica a conexo entre a besta de cauda e o jinchuriki. Sakura percebe que Naruto enfrenta o mesmo destino e lgrimas escorrem em seu rosto.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Pgina Inacabada
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy fazem uma pausa. Quando a perseguio recomea, Kakashi explica a Chiyo que Naruto tambm um jinchuriki. Chiyo lamenta ter sido ela que selou o shukaku dentro de Gaara... Gaara engolfado por uma luz branca.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Infiltrao: O Covil Da Cobra!
programme.desc: As equipes Kakashi e Guy chegam ao esconderijo dos akatsuki, mas so parados por uma barreira de cinco selos. Neji usa seu byakugan para localizar os selos e os ninjas destroem a barreira. Naruto tem uma viso chocante. A equipe Guy encara uma armadilha.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Laos
programme.desc: Quebrar a barreira de cinco selos ativa uma armadilha, e a equipe Guy enfrenta cpias idnticas de si mesmos. Deidara e Sasori lutam para se apoderar do jinchuriki. Forado a seguir Naruto, Kakashi pede que vov Chiyo e Sakura no faam nada precipitado.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Algo Importante...
programme.desc: A luta entre av e neto comea. Para derrotar o verdadeiro Sasori dentro do boneco, Hiruko deve ser destrudo primeiro. S a prpria av consegue entender as armadilhas complexas de Sasori, mas Sakura que deve dar o golpe final. Que estratgia usaro?

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: A Histria Do lbum Ilustrado
programme.desc: Chiyo e Sakura expem Sasori, que no envelheceu nada nos ltimos vinte anos. Chiyo fica mais chocada com o segundo boneco que Sasori revela. Sasori foi quem planejou o desaparecimento do kazecage. Uma equipe ninja se dirige a um certo local.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Reencontro
programme.desc: Sakura fica cercada por uma nuvem de veneno e usa um papel bomba para se livrar da fumaa. Ela tenta capturar Sasori para for-lo a dar informaes sobre Orochimaru, invocando dois bonecos para esta batalha. Naruto e Kakashi ainda perseguem Deidara!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Poder De Uchiha
programme.desc: Os bonecos criados de humanos podem comandar o jutsu que o humano usava enquanto vivo. Assim, o boneco do terceiro kazekage converte chakras em poderes magnticos. Chiyo e Sakura se protegem, Sasori faz um ataque implacvel. Sakura toma uma deciso.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Ttulo
programme.desc: Sakura revida o ataque da areia de ferro. Ela rapidamente comea a ler os padres de ataque do Sasori, que se prepara para usar seu chakra. O ataque da areia de ferro penetra o espao, Sakura atingida na mo e infectada pelo veneno!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Pesadelo
programme.desc: Sakura destri o boneco do terceiro kazekage graas a um antdoto que ela tomou e que funciona durante cerca de trs minutos. Chiyo e Sakura decidem derrotar Sasori nesse prazo. Sasori usa seu ltimo trunfo. Naruto e Kakashi planejam capturar Deidara.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Vento
programme.desc: Sakura e Vov Chiyo derrotam Sasori, mas ele acaba revivendo. Chiyo invoca bonecos com a tcnica do ataque branco secreto, e Sasori aplica seu ataque vermelho secreto. O antdoto de Sakura perde efeito, mas ela e Chiyo iniciam uma decisiva batalha final!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contoro
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo usa o ltimo antdoto em Sakura. Sasori tenta pr fim vida de Vov Chiyo, mas ela revida e o derrota. Sakura atingida em um lugar vital, e a nica coisa que pode salv-la um jutsu que a Vov Chiyo criou uma vez para Sasori.

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Despertar Do Sono Eterno
programme.desc: Os ninjas da equipe Guy se preocupam com o resultado da luta de Sakura e Vov Chiyo enquanto enfrentam suas cpias, que permanecem firmes! Naruto segue Deidara, que se apoderou de Gaara. A preparao para a nova tcnica de Kakashi est em andamento!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Solido
programme.desc: Sakura corre para achar Naruto com Vov Chiyo, sofrendo envenenada. Kakashi revela seu mangekyo sharingan, um poderoso jutsu que transporta tudo o que o olho pode ver para outra dimenso. Naruto finalmente consegue salvar Gaara, mas fica enfurecido ...

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Um Novo Inimigo
programme.desc: Naruto perde o controle e o esprito da Raposa de Nove Caudas assume o comando. Kakashi consegue suprimir a Raposa de Nove Caudas. Deidara descobre a derrota de Sasori. A equipe Guy cerca Deidara, que tenta se explodir junto com os ninjas da folha!

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Impermanncia
programme.desc: Vov Chiyo realiza o jutsu de ressuscitao em Gaara. Gaara acorda cercado por Naruto e os outros e tambm por uma multido de ninjas da areia. Percebendo a verdade por trs do jutsu de ressuscitao, todos demonstram seu respeito por Chiyo.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Aps o ataque do Cl Otsutsuki, o Encontro dos Cinco Kages acontece na Aldeia da Folha. Os Kages atuais e seus predecessores se renem, exceto por Ohnoki, o Terceiro Tsuchikage.
programme.sub-title: A pedra mais dura do mundo

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Os ninjas encarregados de guardar o Porto da Aldeia da Folha so atacados, e Mitsuki desaparece.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: A aldeia descobre que Boruto e Sarada saram em busca de Mitsuki. Ento a Equipe 10, de Shikadai, recebe a misso de rastre-los e traz-los de volta.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Orochimaru fala para Boruto e Sakura sobre o Sbio da Cobra Branca que vive na Caverna Ryuchi. No caminho, os dois so confrontados pela Equipe 10.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e seus amigos descobrem que, para se encontrar com o Sbio da Cobra Branca, precisaro passar por uma srie de testes.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: O Sbio da Cobra Branca pede que Boruto traga para ele uma "Escama Invertida" de Garaga, uma cobra problemtica.

programme.title: Boruto: Naruto Next Generations
programme.desc: Boruto e companhia trabalham juntos para conseguir a Escama Invertida de Garaga, mas a batalha se mostra difcil, uma vez que Garaga tem o poder de sentir a localizao dos inimigos e transform-los em pedra.
programme.sub-title: Um inimigo feroz: O ataque cruel de Garaga!

programme.title: Gretel & Hansel, (2020, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: A long time ago in a distant fairytale countryside, a young girl (Sophia Lillis) leads her little brother (newcomer Samuel J. Leakey) into a dark wood in desperate search of food and work, only to stumble upon a nexus of terrifying evil.

programme.title: Winnie The Pooh: Blood and Honey, (2022, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Winnie-The-Pooh: Blood and Honey follows Pooh and Piglet as they go on a rampage after Christopher Robin abandons them.

programme.title: The Mouse Trap, (2024, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: It's Alex's 21st Birthday, but she's stuck at the amusement arcade on a late shift so her friends decide to surprise her, but a masked killer dressed as a mouse decides to play a game of his own with them which she must survive.

programme.title: Cinderella's Revenge, (2024, Cult Horror)
programme.desc: Cinderella is pushed too far by her evil stepsisters and stepmother, which causes her to switch out her glass shoes and use the assistance of her Fairy Godmother to seek bloody vengeance.

programme.title: The Little Mermaid, (2024, Supernatural Horror)
programme.desc: Beauty is both deceiving and dangerous in this dark twist on Hans Christian Andersen's classic tale, as an underwater discovery draws an innocent man into a mermaid's evil world.

programme.title: 31, (2016, Zombies)
programme.desc: From the visionary mind of Rob Zombie comes a story of five carnival workers who are kidnapped and forced to fight for their lives against an endless parade of homicidal maniacs.

programme.title: Maniac (2012), (2013, Slashers and Serial Killers)
programme.desc: Just when you thought the streets were safe, a serial killer is stalking beautiful coeds in this terrifying thriller starring Elijah Wood.

programme.title: Cooties, (2015, Zombies)
programme.desc: Teachers have the worst Monday ever when their students are turned into little killer savages in this horror comedy with unexpected laughs and unapologetic thrills.

programme.title: The Couch Trip, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: When asylum inmate John Burns (Dan Ackroyd) intercepts a call and impersonates his doctor, he agrees to be the host of a radio advice show and is soon spreading his offbeat psychobabble to ultra-trendy Angelenos in this outrageous comedy!

programme.title: Dirty Rotten Scoundrels, (2017, Comedy)
programme.desc: The south of France. Two rival con men -- one is suave and sophisticated, the other is a third-rate American hustler -- make a wager.

programme.title: Three Amigos!, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: Steve Martin, Chevy Chase and Martin Short are three wild and crazy caballeros in this comedy adventure thats a fiesta of fun. Co-starring Phil Hartman and Jon Lovitz, the 'Three Amigos!' blaze a side-splitting trail across the comedy frontier!

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee, (1986, Comedy)
programme.desc: Michael J. Crocodile Dundee is a free-spirited Australian who hunts crocodiles with his bare hands, stares down giant water buffaloes, and drinks mere mortals under the table.

programme.title: Crocodile Dundee II, (1988, Comedy)
programme.desc: Just as the eccentric Australian is starting to adjust to life in New York City, Dundee and his beautiful girlfriend (Linda Kozlowski) are targeted for death by a gang of ruthless drug dealers.

programme.title: The Heavenly Kid, (1985, Comedy)
programme.desc: Thou Shalt Be Cool with this totally awesome 80s classic when a helpless nerd (Jason Gedrick) gets divine intervention from a hip guardian angel (Lewis Smith) straight from the 1960s! Jane Kaczmarek, Nancy Valen and Richard Mulligan also star.

programme.title: Teen Witch, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: One week before her sixteenth birthday, a girl realizes that she is the descendant from one of the witches of Salem. She uses her newfound powers to snag herself the football-hero as her boyfriend and to become the most popular girl in school.

programme.title: She-Devil, (1989, Comedy)
programme.desc: The author of 32 best-selling romance books takes her accountant away from his frumpy wife. And when this overweight suburban wife discovers what's been going on, she wreaks malicious and delicious revenge...

programme.title: What's Eating Gilbert Grape, (1993, Independent Drama)
programme.desc: Taking care of Arnie is mostly Gilbert's task, which can be pretty demanding, at least while you are working at the local grocery store.

programme.title: Regarding Henry, (1990, Drama)
programme.desc: Henry Turner is a New York lawyer who needs to win at any cost. But a single gunshot brings Henrys fast-track rise to a dead stop, leaving him incapacitated and with no memory of the life he used to lead.

programme.title: The Truman Show, (1998, Drama)
programme.desc: Truman doesnt realize that his quaint hometown is a giant studio set run by a visionary producer/director/creator (Ed Harris), that folks living and working there are Hollywood actors, that even his incessantly bubbly wife is a contract player.

programme.title: In & Out, (1997, Comedy)
programme.desc: A former student who's now an actor tells an audience of millions that Howard is gay. He's outed when he didn't know he was in! Kevin Kline plays Howard, scrambling to go forth with his wedding and doing his best to assert his manliness.

programme.title: The Thing Called Love, (1993, Drama)
programme.desc: In Nashville, there are 10,000 singer-songwriters chasing success... with one chance in a million of getting it. For Miranda "no relation to Elvis" Presley, that's one chance worth taking.

programme.title: Sabrina, (1995, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Harrison Ford plays Linus Larrabee, a busy tycoon who has no room for love in his appointment book. When a romance between his playboy brother and Sabrina, daughter of the family chauffeur, threatens one of Linus business deals, he alters his schedule.

programme.title: Runaway Bride, (1999, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: Julia Roberts plays a small-town girl whose marches down the aisle become a series of near Mrs. when she bolts before saying "I do."

programme.title: How to Lose a Guy in 10 Days, (2003, Romantic comedy)
programme.desc: A "How to..." columnist agrees to write a first-hand account about what it takes to drive a man out of your life... in exactly 10 days.

programme.title: Chinatown, (1974, Thriller)

programme.desc: A troubled chef looks to reignite his passion for cooking by launching a food truck in this spicy film.

programme.desc: When scientists find a way to shrink humans to five inches tall, Paul and his wife decide to get small and live large in a luxurious downsized community. With endless possibilities in the tiny world, Paul realizes we are meant for something bigger.

programme.desc: From Academy Award winner Alexander Payne, comes the story of a father and his adult son who embark on a journey to claim a million-dollar prize. What begins as a fools errand becomes a search for the road to redemption.

programme.title: Citizen Ruth, (1996, Comedy)
programme.desc: In this outrageous satire, Laura Dern is Ruth Stoops, an irresponsible, care-free drug addict pregnant for the fifth time, horrifying everyone around her. Soon, Ruth's at the forefront of a national debate, when all she wants to do is party.

programme.desc: One look, and you know they're from a very strange place. They're from New Jersey, by way of France, by way of far-off, far-out Remulak. They're Coneheads.

programme.desc: James Caan and Robert Duvall star in Sam Peckinpah's tense, action-packed thriller that explores savagery and betrayal in the murky world of killers-for-hire.

programme.desc: Feuding with Sheriff Lyle Wallace (Ernest Borgnine), Martin Penwald (Kris Kristofferson) unites scores of his fellow-drivers via Citizen Band radio into a mile-long convoy which, powered by pent-up resentments, rolls along the Arizona highways.

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever, (1976, Dance & Party)
programme.desc: John Travolta performs as the troubled Tony Manero - Brooklyn paint store clerk by day and undisputed king of the dance floor by night. A powerful and provocative urban tragedy that carries as much significance today as it did in 1977.

programme.title: North Dallas Forty, (1979, Comedy)
programme.desc: In a society in which major league sporting events have replaced Sunday worship as the religion of choice, North Dallas Forty appears like a desecration at the altar.

programme.title: Semi-Tough, (1977, Comedy)
programme.desc: Barbara Jane (Jill Clayburgh), Billy Clyde (Burt Reynolds) and Shake (Kris Kristofferson) have been best friends for years. But when Barbara Jane's new interest in Shake turns into love, Billy Clyde realizes she's the woman hes wanted all along!

programme.title: Gator, (1976, Action)
programme.desc: The Feds want Gator McKlusky (Burt Reynolds) to go undercover to expose a local crime boss and former boyhood pal, Bama McCall. When Gator discovers Bama is involved in extortion, prostitution, and murder, the suspense builds to an explosive climax!

programme.title: Saturday Night Fever, (1976, Dance & Party)
programme.desc: John Travolta performs as the troubled Tony Manero - Brooklyn paint store clerk by day and undisputed king of the dance floor by night. A powerful and provocative urban tragedy that carries as much significance today as it did in 1977.

programme.title: Love and Death: Love and Death, (1975, Comedy)
programme.desc: Woody Allen invades the spirit of Tolstoy in this hilarious spoof of 18th Century Russia, when Napoleon is preoccupied with perfecting his pastry and before Wellington markets his beef.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Grandpa found the Millennium Puzzle decades ago, but little is known about the terrors, traps, turmoil, and treachery he faced to find the ancient artifact! See how it all began as we learn how Grandpa unearthed the Millennium Puzzle.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The evil spirit within the Millennium Ring has reunited with Bakura, prepped with a new monster to create the ultimate Shadow Game. And his first target is Kaiba!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and friends go to the dawn of the duel, to the place where it all began, to the land where the Pharaoh's mysteries lie: Egypt.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The past is quickly becoming perilous as the fearless bandit king Bakura has invaded the Pharaoh's palace to take down the keepers of the seven Millennium Items single-handedly!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Even with the potent power of Obelisk the Tormentor, the Pharaoh couldn't prevent the bandit Bakura from escaping. Everyone knows that thief will return for a rematch, so Seto has a plan to create a powerful army.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad vows to stop the bandit king Bakura's sneak attacks once and for all, but he may have made a promise he can't keep!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Mahad, the first of the Pharaoh's guardians, has fallen. Even worse, the bandit king Bakura now has the Millennium Ring, making his Diabound even more unstoppable!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The origins of the Millennium Items are revealed! Who forged these powerful artifacts, and why were they created? Though the Millennium Items are powerful, such power comes with a heavy price... a debt that may never be able to be repaid!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh calls forth the mighty Egyptian God Slifer the Sky Dragon to fight the bandit Bakura's Diabound, but when Diabound starts attacking the townspeople, the Pharaoh must protect them, even if it means sacrificing himself!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The bandit Bakura has stolen the Millennium Puzzle and sent the Pharaoh plummeting into the abyss. Now he's another step closer to obtaining all seven Millennium Items and resurrecting the malevolent Zorc, the greatest evil of all time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and the Pharaoh are reunited, but the Pharaoh is powerless without the Millennium Puzzle! However, that won't stop the Pharaoh from a final showdown against the bandit king Bakura.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: It's the showdown in the sands between the bandit Bakura and his ever-growing Diabound versus the Pharaoh, Mahad the Dark Magician, and the remaining guardians of the Pharaoh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: With the help of his father's spirit, the Pharaoh and his guardians defeated the bandit Bakura's Diabound and stopped the horrible Zorc from resurrecting... or did they?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh's journey was more than a trip to the past, it's the greatest Shadow Game ever created. Yami Yugi and Yami Bakura's Shadow Game has already reached apocalyptic proportions, but it's only the beginning of cataclysmic events!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Zorc's incredible shadow energies have resurrected the bandit Bakura and his Diabound. With a second chance at revenge, the bandit king has broken up the Pharaoh's team so that he can divide and conquer them one at a time!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The hope of mankind rests on Yugi's shoulders as he arrives at the final temple chamber where the Pharaoh's name is located, but something unexpected is waiting for them - a sinister surprise that can cost them their lives!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After a nearly eternal slumber, the all-powerful Zorc has resurrected, plunging the world into darkness!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part I

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and his guardians are down to their last line of defense as Shada falls victim to Zorc. The Pharaoh desperately wants to summon the three Egyptian Gods, but he can't without his Millennium Puzzle!
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part II

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Exodia the Forbidden One couldn't defeat Zorc! Exodia was able to buy enough time for the Pharaoh to get his Millennium Puzzle back-he can now summon the almighty Egyptian Gods! It's time for the Pharaoh's counterattack in the biggest brawl.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part III

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The three Egyptian Gods have been defeated. The Pharaoh is severely hurt and unable to stop Zorc from setting fire to the city, but our heroes aren't giving up. It's not double vision when Seto and Kaiba transcend time to confront Zorc.
programme.sub-title: The Dark One Cometh: Part IV

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The Pharaoh and Kaiba's combined strength couldn't defeat Zorc. Yugi must give the Pharaoh his name, but Yugi doesn't know how to read ancient Egyptian text. All bets are off in the final clash where Yugi must protect the past to save the future!
programme.sub-title: In the Name of the Pharaoh

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pharaoh Atem, Yugi, and friends have defeated the bandit Bakura and Zorc, but the final test still awaits! Yugi must duel Atem! As they set sail to the final dueling grounds, everyone realizes this may be the final night Yugi and Atem have together.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: If Yugi defeats Atem, Yugi will prove he's ready to stand on his own, and Atem can join his friends in the world beyond. But Yugi and Atem will be separated forever.

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem has summoned all three Egyptian Gods! What chance does Yugi have against these powerful creatures that no one has been able to defeat? Yugi better think of a strategy quickly or this duel will be over soon!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Atem still has all three Egyptian God Cards, Yugi doesn't have a single monster on the field! Yugi claims that he has a combo that will defeat the Egyptian Gods, but is he simply bragging, or does he actually have a plan?

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi and Atem - more than friends, closer than brothers. Will they stay together, or is it time to say goodbye? It's the final answer, the final duel, and the final time we will see our friends in the rousing conclusion to Yu-Gi-Oh!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: When the #1 ranked duelist and ruthless tycoon, Seto Kaiba, kidnaps Yugi's Grandpa to get the rare Blue-Eyes White Dragon card, Yugi must face Kaiba in the ultimate Duel Monsters showdown!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi is forced to face Duel Monsters creator, Maximillion Pegasus, in the mysterious Shadow Realm where all the monsters and magic are real. If Yugi loses, Pegasus claims Grandpa's soul as his prize!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Yugi gives up one of his own Star Chips so Joey can board the boat bound for Duelist Kingdom and duel to save his sister's eyesight. Meanwhile, the cheat Weevil tries to cripple Yugi's deck by tossing his best cards overboard!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Pegasus announces that there are many strange secrets that will make his ultimate tournament unlike any they've ever had. Yugi must not only figure the rules out, but master them if he's to survive!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: After Yugi defeats Weevil's first wave of Duel Monsters, he's shocked to discover that Weevil has one last trick up his sleeve; a ravenous Great Moth that grows in power with every turn!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: Joey finds himself courageously accepting a challenge from veteran duelist, Mai. But when Mai begins to demonstrate an unnerving psychic ability, Joey has to figure out Mai's secret strategy before falling victim to it!

programme.title: Yu-Gi-Oh!
programme.desc: The fisherman duelist baits Yugi into a duel on his own sea playing field for a home-field advantage. Can Yugi adapt to these new settings to turn the tide of battle?

programme.title: Luffy and the Straw Hats find themselves pursued by a deadly cloud of purple gas that turns everything living thing in its path into petrified statues of ash!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Deadliest Weapon of Mass Destruction in History! Shinokuni!

programme.title: Law's got a trick up his sleeve that could mean the difference between life and death. Zoro and company reunite with Nami and Sanji, but can they reach safety before being swallowed by a poisonous cloud?!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Launching the Counter Attack! Luffy and Laws Great Escape!

programme.title: Finally reunited and returned to their proper bodies, the Straw Hats fall in line as Luffy and Law lead the charge to settle the score with Caesar and save the children!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Get to Building R! The Pirate Alliance's Great Advance

programme.title: Caesar hatches a plan to forever silence his enemies, Chopper races through the compound in search of the drugged children, and Tashigi's men make the ultimate sacrifice!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Tashigi's Tears! G-5's Desperate Breakthrough Plan!

programme.title: Luffy races toward Caesar in the hopes of delivering a beating, Sanji saves a damsel in distress, and Chopper tries to prevent the children from eating the drugged candy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Treacherous Vice Admiral! Demon Bamboo Vergo!

programme.title: Sanji and Vergo slug it out in a cloud of toxic gas, Law finds the room that could ruin the New World, and Luffy hopes to bring Caesar's reign of terror to a brutal end!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Fierce Battle Gets Heated! Luffy vs. Caesar!

programme.title: With Law's true ambitions revealed, Doflamingo goes into action in order to protect his criminal operation! Caesar slips away from Luffy leaving him to face off with the frigid Monet, and the rest of the crew face down a menacing dragon!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Mastermind Underground! Doflamingo Makes His Move!

programme.title: Luffy goes down fast after Monet puts a chill into him, and Trafalgar Law makes a desperate attempt to reclaim his heart during an electric battle with Vergo!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Dies from Exposure?! The Spine-chilling Snow Woman Monet!

programme.title: Smoker attacks Vergo for assaulting his men, Luffy meets something strange in the trash heap, and a flashback reveals the true depths of Caesar's madness!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Fists Collide! A Battle of the Two Vice Admirals!

programme.title: Luffy befriends a dragon that used to be a human boy, and Captain Smoker continues his brutal battle with the villainous Vergo!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy hitches a ride on a dragon, Mocha tries to keep the Master's candy away from her friends, and Zoro pits his steel against snow in a battle with Monet!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Deadly Fight in a Blizzard! The Straw Hats vs. the Snow Woman!

programme.title: It's Zoro vs. Monet in a duel to the death - or is it? Tashigi comes to lend a hand, and she'll need to bring her full might to compensate for Zoro's weakness! Meanwhile, Mocha is running out of options for keeping the candy away from the children.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Showing Off His Techniques! Zoro's Formidable One-Sword Style!

programme.title: Chopper, Nami, and Robin watch in horror as Mocha makes a heartbreaking sacrifice in a courageous attempt to save the lives of her friends!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: To Save Her Friends! Mocha Runs at the Risk of Her Life!

programme.title: Brownbeard heroically attempts to expose Caesar as a villain, the horrific truth about Punk Hazard is finally revealed, and Luffy puts the hurt on his gaseous enemy!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Brownbeard in Grief! Luffy Lands a Furious Blow!

programme.title: Luffy makes Caesar pay for his crimes against the children, and Smoker risks his life for a chance to see Vergo fall in battle!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Surprising Outcome! White Chase vs. Vergo!

programme.title: Law reaches the end of his epic battle with Vergo, and Luffy looks to land a devastating final blow on the murderous gasbag Caesar!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Caesar's Defeat! The Powerful Grizzly Magnum!

programme.title: Word of Luffy and Law's alliance spreads throughout the world, Chopper and Brook race to stay ahead of the deadly gas, and Joker sends a team to rescue Caesar!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: The laboratory crumbling around them, and time running out, Luffy, the Straw Hats, the G-5, the children and all the others make a final desperate sprint towards the one exit left off the island - but Joker has one more trick up his sleeve.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: As the Straw Hats and company flee the crumbling laboratory, Caesar's desperate act of vengeance thwarts Joker's plan to forever silence his enemies!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Critical Situation! Punk Hazard Explodes!

programme.title: Franky continues his battle with Buffalo and Baby 5, Nami uses a mighty gust of wind to save the children from a deadly cloud of gas, and Usopp takes a shot at capturing Caesar!
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: A dragon regains his boyish form, a noble warrior once feared dead makes a shocking resurrection, and bitter enemies set aside their differences to enjoy a well-deserved feast!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Touching Reunion! Momonosuke and Kin'emon!

programme.title: The weary marines and the rescued children get teary-eyed as they say goodbye to the Straw Hats. Meanwhile, Law enters into treacherous negotiations with Joker!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: It's Time to Say Goodbye! Leaving Punk Hazard!

programme.title: On their way after having set out from Punk Hazard, the Straw Hats find out their next destination - just as a huge wave comes crashing down on the Sunny! But it's rough sailing for the G-5 as well, as Donflamingo arrives on the scene and wreaks havoc!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The G-5 Wiped Out! Doflamingo's Sudden Attack!

programme.title: Aokiji's intercession saves Smoker and sends Joker off to rethink his strategy, leaving unanswered questions about Aokiji's current status. Meanwhile, the Straw Hats catch their breath as the Sunny makes its way through the rough seas of the New World.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Smooth seas stretch out before the Straw Hats as they leave Punk Hazard far behind -- but while they fear Donflamingo's return and prepare to face him, another foe lies in wait, whose powers could be their downfall!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Caesar Goes Missing! The Pirate Alliance Makes a Sortie!

programme.title: Breed has Luffy, Trafalgar, and Chopper firmly in his grasp with his Peto-Peto power! Breed dreams of a world in which he has enslaved all the humans, but Luffy's stubborn persistence and unwillingness to cooperate may have landed him in hot water.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Luffy Dies at Sea?! The Pirate Alliance Comes Apart!

programme.title: Dressrosa! Luffy and the Straw Hats divide into teams and set about their business on this passionate, enchanting island! But here, in the heart of enemy territory, danger lurks around every corner. Luffy and the others encounter a mysterious blind man.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Explore! A Kingdom of Love and Passion - Dressrosa!

programme.title: Out and about in Dressrosa, Luffy and his team encounter a mysterious and powerful blind gambler - and run into trouble while his shocking powers distract everyone! Meanwhile, a major event in the Colosseum draws huge crowds.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: Full of Enthusiasm! The Corrida Colosseum!

programme.title: Zoro, Sanji, and Kin'emon strike off in search of the thieving fairy who has taken Zoro's sword, but Sanji finds himself mesmerized by the beautiful dancing of a gorgeous Dressrosa woman - with a deadly secret!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Dangerous Love! The Dancer Girl - Violet!

programme.title: Luffy enters the Corrida Colosseum in order to compete for Ace's Flare-Flare Fruit! But with the mightiest warriors of the New World assembled and standing in his way, the competition will not be easy. The first stage of the competition is a battle royal.
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Formidable, Unknown Warrior! Here Comes Lucy!

programme.title: While the deadly battle of Block A winds down, all the onlookers in the stadium are shocked to discover the secret identity of the winner! Meanwhile, Luffy's cover may be blown as another voice from the past returns.
programme.desc: One Piece

programme.title: Luffy meets an unexpected acquaintance from the past, Bellamy, who seems to be up to no good! Meanwhile, Caesar Handover Team encounters a snag when they learn just how dangerous Green Bit is!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: The Fateful Reunion! Bellamy the Hyena!

programme.title: The battle heats up and the widely despised Bartolomeo takes the ring! But he'll have to contend with both the Prodence Kingdom contingent, and Dressrosa's own local favorite, Bellamy! From up above, Luffy risks having his cover blown!
programme.desc: One Piece
programme.sub-title: A Super Rookie! Bartolomeo the Cannibal!

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: 3022, (2019, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Halfway through a 10 year mission in deep space, a group of astronauts awaken to find Earth has suffered a catastrophic event. The already unstable crew desperately races to repair their deteriorating space station and fight off unforeseen threats.

programme.title: Tank Girl, (1995, Adventure)
programme.desc: In this laugh-a-minute, futuristic thriller, a mega-villain controls the world's water supply, and it's up to Tank Girl and her outrageous cohorts to end his greedy reign.

programme.title: Total Recall, (1990, Science fiction)
programme.desc: It's 2084 A.D. and Doug Quaid is haunted by recurring dreams about journeying to Earths closest planetary neighbor, Mars.

programme.title: 3022, (2019, Science fiction)
programme.desc: Halfway through a 10 year mission in deep space, a group of astronauts awaken to find Earth has suffered a catastrophic event. The already unstable crew desperately races to repair their deteriorating space station and fight off unforeseen threats.

programme.title: Species, (1995, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: She's beautiful, seductive, intelligent, and her charms could spell doom for the entire human race! Ben Kingsley, Forrest Whitaker, and Natasha Henstridge star in this adrenaline-charged sci-fi hit.

programme.title: Species II, (1998, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: A trio of American astronauts become instant heroes as they plant the Stars and Stripes on Mars before beginning the voyage home. But back on their ship, something else has set its sights on Earth, something whose relatives have already paid us a visit.

programme.title: Species III, (2004, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: In the ongoing fight for supremacy between mankind and the human-alien hybrids, a fatal hybrid weakness has given humans the advantage. Until now.

programme.title: Species: The Awakening, (2007, Sci-Fi Horror)
programme.desc: When Miranda Hollander suffers a strange blackout, she learns her true origin as a human-alien hybrid and becomes locked in battle with other hybrids. But time is running outwill she surrender to her own killer instincts in the search for a mate?

programme.title: Return of Sabata, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: The great Lee Van Cleef ('Death Rides a Horse') returns as the famous freewheeling gunslinger Sabata. In this third and final go-round for the enigmatic sharpshooter, Sabata seeks revenge when a band of desperadoes bilks him out of $5,000.

programme.title: Oklahoma!, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: In Oklahoma, several farmers, cowboys and a traveling salesman compete for the romantic favors of various local ladies.

programme.title: The Way West, (1967, Drama)
programme.desc: Icons Kirk Douglas, Robert Mitchum and Richard Widmark star in this sumptuous, epic tale of the brave men and women in the U.S. who left the comfort and safety of life in the East for the promise of free land a better life in the untamed West.

programme.title: Man With The Gun, (1955, Drama)
programme.desc: Robert Mitchum portrays an Exterminator--in the American West. He will, for a price, eliminate any outlaws annoying the peace of any Western town. When his wife, in disgust, leaves him, he pursues her, only to encounter his greatest gunfighting challenge.

programme.title: Doc, (1971, Drama)
programme.desc: Stacy Keach, Haris Yulin, and Faye Dunaway give riveting performances in this controversial and myth-shattering reexamination of the darker side of gunslinger Doc Holliday and the actions that led to the infamous showdown in Tombstone, Arizona.

programme.title: Comes a Horseman, (1978, Drama)
programme.desc: Set in the American West of the 1940s, a pair of little-guy ranchers join forces against the depredations of a ruthless land baron determined to expand his empire at whatever cost. Starring Jane Fonda, James Caan, and Jason Robards.

programme.title: Night Stage To Galveston, (1952, Drama)
programme.desc: Gene Autry and Pat Buttram work for a newspaper publisher, and find evidence of corruption in the Texas State Police. The publishers daughter is kidnapped to prevent the story from being published.

programme.title: John Wayne: Cold Vengeance, (1935, Drama)
programme.desc: When his father is gunned down by bandits, John Mason (Wayne) hatches a plot to catch the killer. In Vibrant Color!

programme.title: Buffalo Bill And The Indians, (1976, Drama)
programme.desc: Buffalo Bill has fought Indians & Civil War battles, but nothing can prepare him for show business! When he signs Sitting Bull for a role in his Wild West Show, the clash of cultures reverberates far beyond the boundaries of their sprawling theater.

programme.title: Be Cool, (2005, Comedy)
programme.desc: John Travolta is back as Chili Palmer in this sequel to "Be Cool." With an all-star cast that includes Uma Thurman and The Rock, "Be Cool" is the hilarious tale about a gangster-turned-music-mogul...and what it takes to be number one with a bullet!

programme.title: The Brothers Bloom, (2009, Action)
programme.desc: The con is on when two swindlers (Adrien Brody, Mark Ruffalo) make an heiress (Rachel Weisz) the target of their next scheme.

programme.title: The Core, (2003, Science fiction)
programme.desc: The Earth has stopped rotating because of a change in the planet's core temperature. To restore the normal temperature, astronauts must travel to the center and detonate a nuclear bomb before the core superheats and destroys all life on the surface.

programme.title: War of the Worlds, (2005, Science fiction)
programme.desc: A contemporary retelling of H.G.Wells' classic, the sci-fi thriller reveals the extraordinary battle for the future of humankind through the eyes of one American family.

programme.title: Minority Report, (2002, Science fiction)
programme.desc: In the future, a division of the police department has the technology to arrest killers before they commit crimes; however, the tables turn on one of the cops working within the division.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako receives a surprise visit from Katarina, Minakos former partner. A tragic incident forced them to go their separate ways.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon and the other Sailor Guardians appear to have a falling-out. But its all part of the plan to locate the enemys hideout.
programme.sub-title: Usagi Abandoned: The Falling-Out of the Sailor Guardians

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Venus finds the Dark Kingdom's hideout. The Sailor Guardians fall into Kunzites trap, which hurls them into the past.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Awakening: A Message from the Distant Past

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The Sailor Guardians head into the Arctic Circle. Queen Beryl sends the DD Girls. The Sailor Guardians fall as they try to defeat the DD Girls.
programme.sub-title: Death of the Sailor Guardians: The Tragic Final Battle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon attempts to free Endymion from Queen Beryls control. Sailor Moon is forced to fight the man she loves.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Eternal Wish: A Brand New Life

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Having lost all memory of being Sailor Moon, Usagi now lives her life as an ordinary girl.
programme.sub-title: Moon Returns: The Mysterious Aliens Appear

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Sailor Moon finds herself facing new enemies from outer space. The two aliens disguise themselves as humans to go after other human energy.
programme.sub-title: For Love and for Justice: Sailor Guardians Once Again

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi, Mako, and Ami see a boy attacked by one of Ail and Ans Cardian monsters. To Makos surprise, the boy turns out to be her childhood friend.
programme.sub-title: For Whom Is the White Rose? The Moonlight Knight Appears

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi goes to a virtual reality arcade in the Juban District, where she unexpectedly runs into Mamoru, as well as Seijuro and Natsumi.
programme.sub-title: Usagi's Crisis: The Tiara Stops Working

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and her friends are enjoying the cherry blossoms when the Cardian Leshy attacks. The Sailor Guardians are caught.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako befriends a little girl named Mie who is a huge fan of Sailor Moon. Meanwhile, Ail and An send a Cardian to steal energy from young children.
programme.sub-title: The Targeted Kindergarteners: Venus to the Rescue

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Mamoru find themselves looking after a baby boy while his mother is recovering from having her energy stolen by a Cardian.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A school festival is going to be held at T.A. Girls Academy, which Rei attends. Usagi and Ami go to check up on her.
programme.sub-title: The School Festival Is for Me?! Queen Rei's Song

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami and Makoto are trying to figure out who the Moonlight Knight is. Makoto volunteers to investigate by getting closer to Seijuro.
programme.sub-title: Is Seijuro the Moonlight Knight? Mako on Fire

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and the girls get into an argument over who gets to play Snow White in the upcoming play with Mamoru.
programme.sub-title: Steal a Kiss from Mamoru: An's Project Snow White

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi and Natsumi both get detention after angering Ms. Haruna during class. The two start working on their assignment when a Cardian shows up.
programme.sub-title: After-School Trouble: Usagi Is a Target

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ail and An learn that the Makai Tree is beginning to die. Usagi and her friends visit Natsumi after hearing that Natsumi is not feeling well.
programme.sub-title: Disconnecting Love: The Raging Makai Tree

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: While visiting Seijuro and Natsumi's apartment, Usagi and Mamoru come under attack by the Makai Tree.
programme.sub-title: True Love Awakens: The Makai Tree's Secret

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: A mysterious girl suddenly falls down from the sky. Calling herself 'Usagi,' the girl demands Usagi to tell her where the Silver Crystal is.
programme.sub-title: Angel or Devil? The Mysterious Girl from the Sky

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Usagi wakes up to find that Chibi-Usa has gone missing. Meeting up with Mamoru, the two search for Chibi-Usa, finding her alone at the park.
programme.sub-title: Usagi Devastated: Mamoru Declares a Break-Up

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami is offered a chance to study abroad in Germany. Knowing how important this is to her, Usagi and the others urge Ami to accept the offer.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rei's grandfather is upset that Hikawa Shrine has had fewer female visitors lately. He then decides to retire as head priest to start a new business.
programme.sub-title: Women Must Be Strong and Beautiful: Rei's New Special Technique

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rubeus sends down Petz and her Droid to search and capture Chibi-Usa. Chibi-Usa is calling someone telling her she wants to go home.
programme.sub-title: In Search of the Silver Crystal: Chibi-Usa's Secret

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Minako and Makoto clash over their opposing views on love. Usagi takes the girls to a accessory shop, unaware that Petz and Calaveras run the place.
programme.sub-title: Dispute Over Love: Minako and Makoto's Conflict

programme.title: Sailor Moon

programme.sub-title: Usagi's Parental Love: The Curry Romance Triangle

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: The girls enjoy some vacation time on an island. Chibi-Usa and Rei get into a small fight, causing an angry Chibi-Usa to go out to the sea alone.
programme.sub-title: The Beach, the Island and a Vacation: The Guardians' Break

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa leaves the house after being scolded by Usagi. Chibi-Usa begins to cry, which draws the attention of Rubeus and the Four Spectre Sisters.
programme.sub-title: Protect Chibi-Usa: Clash of the Ten Warriors

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Mamoru has a dream which a voice warns him that being with Usagi will bring her great misfortune. Meanwhile, Sailor Moon is attacked by a Droid.
programme.sub-title: Awaken the Sleeping Beauty: Mamoru's Distress

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Wiseman predicts that Chibi-Usa will appear at Hikawa Shrine. Learning of this, Rubeus orders Koan to go down there and eliminate their target.
programme.sub-title: Battle of the Flames of Love! Mars vs. Koan

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Ami enters the World Chess Tournament, but Bertheir is also there, forcing Ami to transform and reveal her identity as a Sailor Guardian to the enemy.

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rubeus gives Petz and Calaveras one last chance to eliminate Rabbit and the Sailor Guardians once and for all.
programme.sub-title: Rubeus the Heartless: The Tragic Sisters

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Chibi-Usa learns that Usagi is Sailor Moon. Eager to return to the future, she steals Usagi's Silver Crystal and flees, only to be ambushed by Rubeus.
programme.sub-title: A UFO Appears: The Sailor Guardians Abducted

programme.title: Sailor Moon
programme.desc: Rubeus succeeds in taking four of the five Sailor Guardians prisoner. He demands that Sailor Moon bring Chibi-Usa and the Silver Crystal to him.

programme.title: MARAUDERS, (2016, Action)
programme.desc: When an untraceable group of elite bank robbers execute the perfect heist making off with millions in cash and leaving a dead bank manager in their wake, the FBI Agents investigating the robbery/homicide.

programme.title: Nobody's Fool, (1995, Drama)

programme.title: Instinto Predador, (2019)

O assassino se liberta e liberta os animais. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Nicolas Cage Framke Janssen, Kevin Durand, LaMonica Garrett Diretor: Nick Powell

programme.title: Sem Lei, (2011)
programme.desc: 2011. Um grupo de trs amigos planeja um grande roubo que acaba dando errado quando um deles se revela um traidor. Enganado, Sonny decide assumir o problema de frente e busca vingana contra o antigo parceiro. Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Bruce, Phillippe, Ryan, Willis Diretor: Mike Gunther

programme.title: O Grande Dave, (2008)

programme.title: Distrito 13 - Ultimato, (2004)

Gneros: Crime Elenco: Philippe Torreton, David Belle, Cyril Raffaelli Diretor: Patrick Alessandrin

programme.title: A Famlia da Noiva, (2005)

programme.title: Show de Vizinha, (2004)

programme.title: Alvo Duplo, (2012)
programme.desc: 2012. Dois caras dures e pertencentes a lados opostos da lei vo unir foras para dar um ponto final em uma onda de assassinatos brutais, mas a tarefa no ser nada fcil e muito sangue vai rolar. Gneros: Crime Elenco: Christian, Slater, Stallone, Sylvester Diretor: Walter Hill

Gneros: Action & Adventure Elenco: Henry Cavill, Alexandra Daddario, Stanley Tucci, Ben Kingsley Diretor: David Raymond

programme.title: Sangue Oposto, (2018)

programme.title: A Vinganca Minha, (2012)

programme.title: Assassino em Srie, (2017)

programme.title: A Perseguio, (2011)

programme.title: Minha Vida de Cachorro, (1970)

programme.title: A Eterna Namorada, (1970)

programme.title: As Duas Faces de Janeiro, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Chester e Colette decidem fazer uma viagem de barco Grcia. No local, eles conhecem Rydal, um guia americano que fala grego e decide ajud-los. O que eles no sabem que Rydal conhecido por aplicar golpes nos turistas. Gneros: Drama

programme.title: Uma Grande Amizade, (1970)
programme.desc: 1970. Flora uma elefanta circense que no consegue mais executar seus truques e vai ser sacrificada. Na noite anterior data da eutansia, a filha do proprietrio do circo a salva. Juntas, elas enfrentam desafios para chegar reserva animal. Gneros: Drama

programme.desc: 2007. Os ninjas da areia lutam contra o tempo para salvar kankuro,at queumaperitaem veneno da areia, vov chiyo chamada.a nica esperana est nos reforos enviados por tsunade. Mas naruto, sakura e kakashi so atrasados por uma tempestade de areia. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Ursula Bezerra, Tati Keplmair, Robson Kumode, Marcus Pejon, Yuri Chesman, Vagner Fagundes, Flavia Narciso, Thiago Keplmair, Elcio Sodre Diretor: Hayato Date

programme.title: Naruto: Uma Misso Perigosa, Uma Aventura No Pas Das Ondas - T01E06
programme.sub-title: Uma Misso Perigosa, Uma Aventura No Pas Das Ondas
programme.desc: 2020. Naruto e sua equipe comeam suas primeiras misses de ninja cumprindo tarefas entediantes e bsicas. Cansado e com fome, Naruto desabafa com o Hokage que, entretido, prope uma nova misso: proteger um velho rabugento chamado Tazuna at a casa dele! Gneros: Anime

programme.title: Naruto: O Assassino Da Nvoa - T01E07
programme.desc: 2020. Naruto e sua equipe chegam ao Pas das Ondas, onde o perverso negociante chamado Gato controla a terra. Gato contrata Zabuza Momochi para matar Tazuna. Animado, Naruto no v a hora de enfrentar esse poderoso ninja assassino. Gneros: Anime

programme.title: Naruto: O Juramento De Dor - T01E08
programme.desc: 2020. Kakashi est em vantagem na batalha contra Zabuza, mas a situao se reverte quando Kakashi preso na Priso de gua de Zabuza! Kakashi insisite para que a equipe fuja, mas Naruto lembra da promessa que fez de nunca mais fugir e decide ficar!! Gneros: Anime

programme.title: Naruto: Kakashi, O Guerreiro Sharingan - T01E09
programme.desc: 2020. Graas ao plano de Naruto, Kakashi escapa da Priso de gua. Zabuza derrotado e ferido, mas de repente um misterioso ninja rastreador aparece e mata Zabuza. Naruto se espanta ao ver um garoto no muito mais velho que ele derrotar Zabuza to facilmente. Gneros: Anime

programme.title: Naruto: A Floresta do Chakra - T01E10
programme.desc: 2020. Recuperando-se na casa de Tazuna, Kakashi conclui que Zabuza no morreu e que o jovem ninja o ajudou a escapar! Kakashi decide comear um novo treinamento para ajudar Naruto, Sasuke e Sakura a controlarem melhor seus chakras! Gneros: Anime

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Contato - T02E61

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: Os Dois Reis - T02E63

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden: O Sinal De Fogo Preto - T02E64

programme.title: Naruto Shippuden - T02E67

programme.title: 2001. Em uma certa aldeia, Shippo conhece uma garota chamada Satsuki. Satsuki acredita que seu irmo, que foi guerra, voltar. Ela mostra a Shippo o tesouro que seu irmo lhe deu, um fragmento de Jia. Infelizmente, apenas uma flor feita de pedra. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: A Flor de Pedra e o Primeiro Amor de Shippo
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E01

programme.title: 2002. Os maridos esto sendo atrados para longe de sua aldeia por uma bela youkai. Suas esposas pedem a Mirok para derrot-la. Preocupado com ele, Sango o acompanha. Mas Sango separada dele por uma nvoa estranha. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: A Tentao da Linda Mulher na Nvoa
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E02

programme.title: 2002. Sango volta para a vila dos exterminadores para consertar seu Osso Voador. Indo para o poo, Agome encontra uma Nimenka, uma fruta que parece um rosto. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: Tudo o que Aconteceu na Noite de Togenkyo: Parte 1
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E03

programme.title: 2002. Tokajin sequestra Agome. Inuyasha escapa do jardim em miniatura com a ajuda de Mirok e os outros e vai salvar Agome. Enquanto escapa, ele encontra uma flor com o rosto de um velho sbio. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: Tudo o que Aconteceu na Noite de Togenkyo: Parte 2
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E04

programme.title: 2002. Sango retorna para a sua vila e conserta o Osso Voador. Ela tambm coloca o pai e as cinzas de seus companheiros para descansar. Quando ela est prestes a sair, ela atacada. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E05

programme.title: 2002. Narak chama uma sacerdotisa chamada Tsubaki. H cinquenta anos ela foi derrotada por Kikyo quando foi atrs da Jia. Ela uma sacerdotisa sombria que vendeu sua alma a um youkai para manter sua juventude e agora est atrs do sangue de Agome. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: A Sacerdotisa das Sombras; Uma Maldio de 50 Anos
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E06

programme.title: 2002. Agome luta contra a maldio colocada por Tsubaki, uma sacerdotisa sombria. Enquanto isso, Kikyo aparece diante de Tsubaki. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: Kikyou Aparece! O Uso do Shikigami
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E07

programme.title: 2002. A maldio de Tsubaki rouba a conscincia de Agome. Agome esquece o Japo feudal em um mundo ilusrio. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E08

programme.title: 2002. Tsubaki visita a manso onmyoji onde ela j treinou e planeja abrir uma porta proibida com o poder da Jia. programme.sub-title: A Sacerdotisa Azul e a Sacerdotisa Vermelha que Bloqueiam o Caminho
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E09

programme.title: 2002. Tsubaki uma sacerdotisa que foi considerada a par com Kikyo. Ela estava com raiva porque a Jia no lhe foi confiada, ento se tornou uma sacerdotisa sombria. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: Karon, O Demnio Gigante da Torre
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E10

programme.title: 2002. Uma noite, algum possui Sango para atacar Mirok. O grupo examina um youkai que eles suspeitam estar por trs disso, mas esto enganados. Mirok possudo em seguida e ataca Sango. Shippo tenta fugir, mas encurralado por uma pequena sombra. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E11

programme.title: 2002. H uma fenda na barreira de Narak. Mas o comeo do ms, e quando a noite cai, Inuyasha perde seus poderes, e a busca por Narak adiada. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: A Barreira de Narak; A Deciso de Kagura
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E12

programme.title: 2002. Kagura se aproxima de Sesshomaru e diz a ele para matar Narak, mas Sesshoumaru se recusa. Enquanto Inuyasha e os outros procuram por Kagura, eles percebem que Narak um meio-youkai. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E13

programme.title: 2002. Shippo recebe uma carta desafiando-o para uma batalha. O remetente da carta Soten Raijyu, e ele ainda apenas uma criana. Ele investigou Inuyasha e os outros e determinou que eles eram muito fortes, ento ele focou sua ateno em Shippo. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E14

programme.title: 2002. Um youkai nascido de um pedao de carne que Narak descartou se transforma em um homem sem rosto e rouba o rosto bonito de Muso, um monge viajante. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E15

programme.title: 2002. Muso ataca Agome e Inuyasha o destri com sua Ferida do Vento. Narak, que estava assistindo ao evento, diz a Kagura para contar a Inuyasha onde Muso foi. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E16

programme.title: 2002. Muso se regenera e Miroku diz a Inuyasha que o corao do youkai fica na cicatriz em forma de aranha. Kagura interfere e os insetos tiram o fragmento de Muso. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: A Batalha de Trs at a Morte
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E17

programme.title: 2002. Inuyasha visita Totosai em busca de uma tcnica que pode romper a barreira de Narak. L ele conhece Bunza. Os dois fazem como Totosai os ordena. Bunza age como se fosse o discpulo mais velho, mas acaba entrando em colapso. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E18

programme.title: 2002. Miuga entrega uma mensagem para Totosai. Ele diz que a Tessaiga ficar mais forte se cortar derrotar um poderoso youkai. O grupo procura ento os youkais morcegos. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: A Me e os Sentimentos de Shiori
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E19

programme.title: 2002. O youkai morcego tenta destruir a aldeia junto com a me de Shiori. Inuyasha bloqueado pela barreira da menina e no consegue derrot-lo. programme.sub-title: O Tessaiga Vermelha que Quebra a Barreira
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E20

programme.title: 2002. A tribo youkais Gatos do Fogo ataca do oeste. Seu objetivo obter os fragmentos da Jia de Agome, bem como se vingar de Sesshomaru e Inuyasha, filhos do grande co youkai. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: A Conspirao dos Quatro Youkais Gatos de Fogo
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E21

programme.title: 2002. Inuyasha corta a barreira e junto com o Kuga, eles entram no castelo. Enquanto isso, Mirok e Sango caram sob um feitio, e Agome est presa em uma priso. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: Os Alvos so Sesshomaru e Inuyasha
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E22

programme.title: 2002. O Rei Pantera, o general da tribo Pantera, comea a se mover com o poder da Jia. Inuyasha e Sesshomaru atacam a mmia. Enquanto isso, Kuga, Mirok e os outros levam Agome e os outros para um local seguro. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: Os Gatos de Fogo e a Espada de Dois Caninos
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E23

programme.title: 2002. Sango convidada a matar um youkai por um jovem senhor chamado Kuranosuke, que se apaixonou por ela seis anos atrs. Kuranosuke tem aparncia, status e riqueza. Sango est confusa sobre como ela recusar sua proposta de casamento. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E24

programme.title: 2002. A Tessaiga est equipada com uma tcnica que pode romper barreiras. Jaken planeja roub-la de Inuyasha, mas seus planos fracassam continuamente. programme.sub-title: O Plano de Jaken para Roubar Tessaiga
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E25

programme.title: 2002. Narak diz a Sesshomaru que ele devolver Rin se ele matar Inuyasha, mas Sesshomaru se recusa e vai at o castelo dele. Enquanto isso, Agome detecta a presena da Jia. programme.sub-title: Sesshomaru e o Sequestro de Rin
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E26

programme.title: 2002. Narak est tentando absorver Sesshomaru para que ele possa obter os poderes de um youkai completo. Mas Inuyasha rompe sua barreira e interfere. Quando Narak v que o jogo foi virado, ele foge. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T03E27

programme.title: 2002. Agome retorna aos dias atuais. Ela est ocupada se preparando para um simulado de dois dias. Enquanto isso, Sango est preocupada com Kohaku, que foi levado por Kagura. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: A Conexo Entre o Presente e a poca das Guerras
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T04E01

programme.title: 2002. Ayame, uma youkai loba, aparece diante de Kuga e diz a ele que sua noiva. Mas Kuga loucamente apaixonado por Agome. Em sua fuga, Kuga encontra o castelo de Narak. Ayame vai atrs dele e atacada por um youkai. Gneros: Anime Elenco: Fbio Lucindo (Mirok), Ftima Noya (Sango), Leticia Quinto (Agome Higurashi), Mauro Limai (Inuyasha), Priscilla Concepcion (Shippo), Silvio Giraldi (Sesshomaru) Diretor: Yasunao Aoki
programme.sub-title: A Youkai Loba e a Grande Promessa
programme.desc: Inuyasha BR - T04E02
